**Government Tender Announcement**

Title: Control Interviewing for Outbreak Investigations

Reference Number: PW-22-01008946

### Details of the Opportunity
Solicitation number: 1000244849
Publication date: September 30, 2022
Tender closing date: October 18, 2022, 02:00:00 PM (EDT)
Solicitation status: Expired
Industry NAICS code: Data Analysis - Performance of a Survey (B301A)

### Description of the Requirements
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC), through the Centre for Foodborne, Environmental and Zoonotic Infectious Disease (CFEZID), requires contracting services to support outbreak investigations. The successful contractor will provide bilingual interviewing capacity, data entry services, and analytical support to identify sources of foodborne outbreaks.

### Key Requirements
* Conduct control interviews for outbreak investigations to strengthen the evidence in identifying the source of an outbreak
* Recruit, train, and retain a team of interviewers to conduct interviews in English and French
* Provide data entry services to document and analyze the results of the interviews
* Develop and implement an effective recruitment strategy to obtain the necessary number of controls for each study
* Assist in the development of questionnaires and study protocols as required
* Collaborate with the PHAC and other stakeholders to ensure effective communication and coordination throughout the study

### Exclusions
The following services are excluded from this tender:
* Conducting epidemiological research or analysis
* Developing outbreak investigation protocols or guidelines
* Providing public health advice or guidance

### Accepted Language
Both English and French languages are accepted for the purposes of this tender.

### Tender Documents
The tender documents can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/30/279d412e360e63044a3c04a0468a44fc/pr_1000244849_-_request_for_proposal_en.pdf) (English) and [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/30/1f9d8556a7c17b505ebe7e8e4ef682c2/pr_1000244849_-_request_for_proposal_fr.pdf) (French).
